Sri Mulyani-Istana Mulai Selidiki Desa 'Hantu'
07 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Lamhot Aritonang

Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati dianggap hanya bikin gaduh lantaran mengungkapkan bahwa ada desa tak berpenduduk atau desa 'hantu'. Anggapan tersebut datang dari Badan Koordinasi Nasional Pembangunan, Pemerintahan, dan Pemberdayaan Kemasyarakatan Desa/Bakornas P3KD.Bakornas P3KD menegaskan tidak ada desa 'hantu' yang selama ini menikmati aliran dana desa. Karena itu, Mantan Direktur Pelaksana Bank Dunia ini pun langsung menginvestigasinya.Pihak Kementerian Desa, Pembangunan Daerah Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi (PDTT) bahkan menilai tidak ada desa tak berpenduduk yang menikmati aliran dana desa. Sri Mulyani-Istana Starts Investigating 'Ghost' Village
07 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Lamhot Aritonang

Jakarta - Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati is considered only making noise because it reveals that there are villages with no inhabitants or 'ghost' villages. This assumption came from the National Coordinating Board for Development, Government and Community Empowerment of the Village / Bakornas P3KD. Bakornas P3KD emphasized that there was no 'ghost' village that had been enjoying the flow of village funds. Therefore, the Former Managing Director of the World Bank was immediately investigated. The Ministry of Villages, Disadvantaged Regions and Transmigration (PDTT) even considered that there were no uninhabited villages that enjoyed the flow of village funds.
